DOC.brief_title: High-resolution Imaging Tear Film Thickness Contact Lenses Wearers With Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) . A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Men woman age 18 year Soft rigid contact lenses wearer Schirmer Test ≥ 10 mm/5 min Tear Breakup Time ( TBUT ) ≥10 second Participation clinical trial previous 3 week Presence abnormality prevent reliable measurement judge investigator Pregnancy , plan pregnancy lactating
